Esmé Frances Hennessy, née Franklin (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1933, Umzinto) bụ onye South African botanist, botanical artist, na ónyé édémédé

Ọ bụ ọkachamara na taxonomic botany. O dere ma gosipụta Erythrinas nke South Africa, Durban 1972, Orchids of Africa 1961 na Joyce Stewart, The Slipper Orchids 1989 na Tessa Hedge, na ọtụtụ nkọwa na efere na Flowering plants of Africa ya na ọrụ n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwé.

A mụrụ Esmé Franklin na Umzinto n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1933 n'ezinụlọ dọkịta. Ọ gụrụ botany na zoology na Mahadum Natal, Pietermaritzburg, wee nweta PhD na botany na 1983. Franklin lụrụ Lt Commander Brian Hennessy R.N
Site na 1958 ruo 1960, Hennessy rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé enyemaka nyocha na C.S.I.R

Amoebiasis Research Unit. N'afọ 1961, Hennessy bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka ónyé nkụzi na Mahadum Durban-Westville Site na 1973 ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi dị elu na Mahadum nke Durban-Westville, ma site na 1984 ọ bụ osote prọfesọ.

N'afọ 1972, Hennessy bipụtara akwụkwọ South African Erythrinas na Durban O mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise na nkọwa màkà Flowering Plants of Africa na American Orchid Society Bulletin; ihe osise ma soro dee Orchids of Africa (1981) ya na Joyce Stewart ma gosipụta ma soro dee The Slipper Orchids (1989) ya na Tessa Hedge. N'afọ 1991, Hennessy kwetara ịbụ onye nchịkọta sayensị nke akwụkwọ Elsa Pooleyás A complete field guide to Trees of Natal, Zululand and Transkei
N'afọ 2020, Botanical Society nke South Africa nyere Dr
Hennessy Cythna Letty Medal iji sọpụrụ ahụ ya nkè ihe osise botanical bipụtara, nke nyéré aka dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite osisi South Africa.
